targets.expr: sum by (peer_id, version) (ct_peer_version) + on(peer_id) group_left() sum by (peer_id)(ct_peer_safe_count{safe="$safe", safe!=""})

sum by (peer_id) (ct_peer_delay) + on(peer_id) group_left() sum by (peer_id)(ct_peer_safe_count{safe="$safe", safe!=""}) - on(peer_id) group_left() sum by (peer_id)(ct_peer_safe_count{safe="$safe", safe!=""})
sum by (peer_id, address) (ct_address_pairs) + on(peer_id) group_left() sum by (peer_id)(ct_peer_safe_count{safe="$safe", safe!=""})

panels.description: Extra balance from the allocation schedule (investors only)
